item.title: WWII Dive Bomber Pilot Explains Physics
item.description: George Walsh, a WWII SB2C Helldiver pilot, explains the physics behind dive bombing, sharing insights on aerial tactics, precision, and wartime aviation techniques.

media:content.media:title: WWII Dive Bomber Pilot Explains Physics
media:content.media:description: George Walsh, a WWII SB2C Helldiver pilot, explains the physics behind dive bombing, sharing insights on aerial tactics, precision, and wartime aviation techniques.

item.title: No Communications, No Mistakes Allowed
item.description: Experience a high-stakes scenario where communication is down and precision is critical, highlighting strategy, focus, and teamwork under pressure.

media:content.media:title: No Communications, No Mistakes Allowed
media:content.media:description: Experience a high-stakes scenario where communication is down and precision is critical, highlighting strategy, focus, and teamwork under pressure.

item.title: Famous for Bringing Beer in WWII
item.description: Hear the story of a WWII soldier who became unexpectedly famous for delivering beer to his buddies, sharing camaraderie, morale, and life on the front lines.

media:content.media:title: Famous for Bringing Beer in WWII
media:content.media:description: Hear the story of a WWII soldier who became unexpectedly famous for delivering beer to his buddies, sharing camaraderie, morale, and life on the front lines.

item.title: Mortarman in Jungle Combat vs 100,000 Soldiers
item.description: Watch a mortarman in intense jungle combat scenarios, demonstrating tactics, strategy, and resilience against overwhelming enemy forces.

media:content.media:title: Mortarman in Jungle Combat vs 100,000 Soldiers
media:content.media:description: Watch a mortarman in intense jungle combat scenarios, demonstrating tactics, strategy, and resilience against overwhelming enemy forces.
